thread.title: BRIEF-Aetna To Provide Pharmacy Rebates At Time Of Sale, Encourages Transparency From Drug Manufacturers

title: BRIEF-Aetna To Provide Pharmacy Rebates At Time Of Sale, Encourages Transparency From Drug Manufacturers
text: 33 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Aetna To Provide Pharmacy Rebates At Time Of Sale, Encourages Transparency From Drug Manufacturers Reuters Staff March 27 (Reuters) - Aetna Inc: * AETNA TO PROVIDE PHARMACY REBATES AT TIME OF SALE, ENCOURAGES TRANSPARENCY FROM DRUG MANUFACTURERS * AETNA INC - ESTIMATED 3 MILLION AETNA MEMBERS COULD POTENTIALLY BENEFIT FROM THE REBATES WHEN FILLING PRESCRIPTIONS * AETNA INC - ‍BEGINNING IN 2019, CO WILL AUTOMATICALLY APPLY PHARMACY REBATES AT TIME OF SALE FOR ITS COMMERCIAL FULLY INSURED PLAN MEMBERS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
